channel.title: lead on cube
channel.description: Recent content in lead on cube

item.title: The speed bumps in LEAD’s plan to digitise India’s budget private schools
item.description: Note: This article was originally published on The Ken website and is subject to their copyright terms and conditions. Summary In the last two years, LEAD has expanded from 600 partner schools to nearly 5,000; it raised $100 million recently, becoming a unicorn in the process Teachers are the centre of its plans to digitise classrooms—by removing the management and lesson planning headache, LEAD lets them focus on teaching
